change.description: Removed the null constraint on workflow event listeners to workflows
change.sql: alter table wf_workflow_event_listener alter workflow_id null;

change.description: Added child index order column to execution contexts
change.sql: alter table wf_execution_context add child_index_order integer;

change.description: Added tracking of ActivityGraph to workflows
Added support for values over 4000 characters

change.sql: alter table wf_activity_trace add workflow_trace_id nvarchar(36);

change.description: Refreshed all foreign keys to ensure they exist

change.sql: update wf_activity_trace set execution_status = 'CLOSED', execution_result='FAULTED' where execution_status in ('UNINITIALIZED', 'INITIALIZED', 'EXECUTING', 'CANCELING') and (execution_result is null or execution_result = 'NONE');
alter table wf_workflow_trace_pause add pausedtemp nvarchar(1); update wf_workflow_trace_pause set pausedtemp = 'P';
alter table wf_workflow_trace_pause drop column paused; exec sp_rename 'wf_workflow_trace_pause.pausedtemp', 'paused', 'COLUMN';

change.description: Prepare schema for trace data reformatting
change.sql: alter table wf_workflow_trace add workflow_trace_data ntext;

change.description: Condense workflow trace data into one table
Add a method data payload to dispatched tasks.
change.sql: alter table wf_dispatched_task add method_data varbinary(max);

change.description: Harvest the workflow data to populate metadata table
Add format column to wf_workflow_trace table
